span.a: Breakfast & Lunch Meals available from 7:30 am - 1pm
Hard copy of Academic Assignments available for pickup or drop off Monday-Friday
Hard copy of Academic Assignments available for pickup or drop off Monday-Friday
Late pickup or drop off of Hard copy of Academic Assignments
Hard copy of Academic Assignments available for pickup or drop off Monday-Friday

p.span: Effective today, Friday, April 17 at noon, Governor Greg Abbott issued an executive order declaring that ALL TEXAS schools will remain closed for the duration of this school year.
Effective today, Tuesday, March 31, Governor Greg Abbott issued an executive order stating that ALL Texas schools shall remained closed at least through May 4, 2020.
Region 20 April Parent trainings via webinars are now available for registration. Please check out the information under "Parents" on the menu bar.

Parents, please make sure your contact information is current! Your student's teacher(s) have been working hard to ensure that you have receive your student's school work as well as keeping in touch with you. Please contact the front office and/or your student's teacher to update your contact information.

Please check “COVID-19" section for Coronavirus information and updates including School Closure, BCACS Distance Learning Program, Free Breakfast and Lunch Meal Program and additional Resources regarding COVID-19.

span.a: Bexar County Academy Charter School new Distance and Online Learning Program

p.span: Spectrum and Comcast to offer free internet service to students.

span.strong: BCACS Community Give Back “FREE Breakfast & Lunch Program”:
Due to schools’ closure because of COVID-19, Bexar County Academy Charter School will be offering free Breakfast and Lunch for all children up to age 19 currently enrolled in school.

Debido al brote del Corina Virus y el cierre de escuelas en toda la ciudad, los padres pueden llevar a cualquier niño de escuela de 19 años de edad que aún asistan a la escuela a cualquier distrito escolar cercano o lugar que participe en el programa de desayuno y almuerzo gratuito.

p.span: Consulte el sitio web del distrito escolar para obtener más información sobre los lugares en donde pueden pasar a recoger desayuno y almuerzo gratuito.

span.strong: You can refer to the BCA school website for further updates on the virus and other important imformation. Let's keep our community safe!! Thank you!

span.p: Questions about this website? Contact the webmaster at: web@bexarcountyacademy.org

Paul Bradley - President
Rene Limon - Vice President
Celeste Bazier - Treasurer
Nathalia Brooks - Secretary
Juanita Moreno - Trustee
